name: Derabella
description:
Controls: 

WASD to move

 'space' to shoot

'p' in start menu to reset high-score

This was my first game jam and real attempt at a simple game. The "Dreamy" theme served as inspiration for both the visuals and floaty mechanics. My interpretation of the "each playthrough is different" limitation was simple. I didn't want it to complicate the process too much so since this was mainly a learning experience for me, so I chose the "i guess rouge-like", auto-scrolling shooter route. This was a lot of fun and help me establish plans and goals for myself. Any suggestions or corrections are appreciated. Hope you enjoy!
